amendment.description: An amendment numbered 38 printed in Part B of House Report 116-32 to expand the National Domestic Violence Hotline to include texting features via telephone.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rose (NY) amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rose (NY) amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A038) offered by Mr. Rose (NY).
